text.author: Paul Bolin
text.title: People v. Bolin, 18 Cal. 4th 297, 336, 956 P.2d 374, 401, 75 Cal. Rptr. 2d 412, 439, 1998 Cal. LEXIS 3645, *65, 98 Daily Journal DAR 6653, 98 Cal. Daily Op. Service 4680 (Cal. June 18, 1998)
text.summary: In a letter to Jerry on 6/25/90, the author threatens Jerry for hitting their daughter Paula and underreporting how much he got for some vehicles, and then demands that Jerry return the author and Paula's things such as clothes, books, a gun, TV and VCR to Paula within a week or suffer the consequences.
